Uses of Class
com.complexible.stardog.StardogException

  • Packages that use StardogException 
    Package Description
    com.complexible.stardog  
    com.complexible.stardog.api
    Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS.
    com.complexible.stardog.api.admin
    SNARL API support for Stardog DBMS administration
    com.complexible.stardog.api.reasoning
    Provides reasoning connection class for answering queries with reasoning results.
    com.complexible.stardog.api.search
    Provides classes and interfaces for performing free-text search over a Stardog database via the SNARL API.
    com.complexible.stardog.icv
    API classes for using Integrity Constraints.
    com.complexible.stardog.icv.api
    Provides SNARL API bindings for Integrity Constraint Validation (ICV).
    com.complexible.stardog.jena
    Provides classes for Stardog-Jena integration.
    com.complexible.stardog.reasoning
    Contains many of the core interfaces and utilities for the reasoning API
    com.complexible.stardog.security
    Collection of interfaces for using the Stardog security framework

    • Uses of StardogException in com.complexible.stardog.security

      Subclasses of StardogException in com.complexible.stardog.security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StardogAuthenticationException
      Exception thrown when it was not possible to authenticate a stardog user with the provided credentials
      class  StardogAuthorizationException
      Exception thrown when the user is not authorized to perform the operation.
      class  com.complexible.stardog.security.StardogSecurityException
